panels.description: The Health panel displays the overall health of a given cluster, which is either Healthy or Unhealthy.
panels.title: Health

panels.description: The Snapshots panel displays the count of active snapshots of a given cluster
panels.title: Snapshots

panels.description: The Hosts panel displays host status information of a given cluster, including the total number of hosts in the cluster, and the count of hosts based on their respective status. For details, go to the Hosts Dashboard.

The Volumes panel displays volume status information of a given cluster, including the total number of volumes in the cluster, and the count of volumes based on their respective status. For details, go to the Volumes Dashboard.
The Bricks panel displays brick status information of a given cluster, including the total number of bricks in the cluster, and the count of bricks based on their respective status.

The Geo-Replication Session panel displays geo-replication session information from a given cluster, including the total number of geo-replication session in the cluster, and the count of geo-replication session based on their respective status.
The Connection Trend panel displays the total number of client connections to bricks in the volumes of a given cluster over a period of time.
panels.title: Connection Trend

panels.description: The IOPS panel displays aggregated brick level read and write operations collected using “gluster volume profile info” over a period of time.
panels.title: IOPS

panels.description: The Capacity Utilization panel displays the used capacity across all volumes for a given cluster.
panels.title: Capacity Utilization

panels.description: The Capacity Available panel displays the available capacity across all volumes for a given cluster.
panels.title: Capacity Available

panels.description: The Weekly Growth Rate panel displays the forecasted weekly growth rate for capacity utilization computed based on daily capacity utilization.
panels.title: Weekly Growth Rate

panels.description: The Weeks Remaining panel displays the estimated time remaining in weeks till volumes reach full capacity based on the forecasted Weekly Growth Rate.
panels.title: Weeks Remaining

panels.description: The Throughput Trend panel displays the network throughput for a given cluster over a period of time.
panels.title: Throughput Trend

panels.description: The Top 5 Utilization By Bricks panel displays the bricks with the highest capacity utilization.
panels.title: Top 5 Utilization by Bricks

panels.description: The Top 5 Utilization By Volumes panel displays the volumes with the highest capacity utilization.
panels.title: Top 5 Utilization by Volume

panels.description: The CPU Utilization by Host panel displays the CPU utilization of  each node in the cluster.
panels.title: CPU Utilization by Host

panels.description: The Memory Utilization by Hosts panel displays memory utilization of  each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Memory Utilization by Host

panels.description: The Ping Latency Trend panel displays the ping latency for each host in a given cluster.
panels.title: Ping Latency Trend

panels.description:
The Volume Status Panel display the status of each volume in a given cluster, whereby the status is as follow:  
0 = Up  
3 = Up(Degraded)  
4 = Up(Partial)  
5 = Unknown  
8 = Down
panels.title: Volume Status

panels.description:
The Host Status Panel displays the status of each host in a given cluster, whereby the status is as follow:  
0 = Up  
8 = Down
panels.title: Host Status

panels.description:
The Brick Status Panel display the status of each brick in a given cluster, whereby the status is as follow:  
1 = Started  
10 = Stopped
panels.title: Brick Status
